summary:
This mod adds 10 new bound weapons.

The spell tomes are located in a chest in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun or can be bought from Phinis Gestor in the College of Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 10 new bound weapons:
Wuuthrad
Blade of Woe
Nightingale Blade
Nightingale Bow
Dawnbreaker
Ebony Blade
Shiv
Scimitar
Executioners Axe
Mehrunes Razor

The spell tomes are located in a chest in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun or can be bought from Phinis Gestor in the College of Winterhold.

If you want to download this mod on the Steam Workshop go to: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1088770377
author: BulletJesus
